title: Remove Unnecessary Code
description: Remove all the unnecessary features that aren't actually needed
starterCode:
# Remove unnecessary code following YAGNI principle
class Calculator:
    def __init__(self):
        self.history = []
        self.last_result = 0
        self.user = "Unknown"
        self.created_at = "2024-01-01"
    
    def add(self, a, b):
        result = a + b
        self.history.append(result)
        self.last_result = result
        return result
    
    def get_history(self):
        return self.history
    
    def clear_history(self):
        self.history = []
    
    def set_user(self, name):
        self.user = name

# We only need to add two numbers
calc = Calculator()
print(calc.add(5, 3))
solution:
# Simplified following YAGNI principle - You Aren't Gonna Need It
class Calculator:
    def add(self, a, b):
        return a + b

# We only need to add two numbers
calc = Calculator()
print(calc.add(5, 3))
hints: Only implement what you actually need now
Remove unused features like history tracking
Remove unused features like user management
YAGNI: You Aren't Gonna Need It
